analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#563-576):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#574-575)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#576)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#398-480):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#409-416)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#420-424)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#454-455)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#452-454)

	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#455-459)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#398-480):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#409-416)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#420-424)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.preallocate (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#491-507):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#493-496)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#499-501)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#501-502)

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#766-792) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#785-792)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#778-792)

CrowdsaleExt.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#275-277)
FractionalERC20Ext.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#263)
FractionalERC20Ext.minCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#264)
MintableTokenExt.mintingFinished should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xbf7c350591ffa4907ce2ed40a6a7e011f368d5d3.sol#896-897)
